English: This will request a financial aid package from other countries.\n§YRecieving countries must have enabled giving grants\n§RCountries with the modifier 'Bad Debter' cannot give grants.§!
This will allow us to give grants to other countries. It must be activated before choosing to request grants. It can be reversed at any time.
This will prevent us from getting events when other countries request grants. It can be reversed at any time.
